Title: The Art of Insider Trading: A Guide on How to Maximize Your Gains and Avoid Getting Caught

Introduction:
Congratulations, reader! You have just stumbled upon the ultimate secret to success in the financial world, the most coveted secret of all—insider trading. You've likely heard of the term before, but what exactly is insider trading? Simply put, it's the practice of corporate insiders (i.e. top executives) buying and selling their company's shares before the public knows about the deal. What makes insider trading so lucrative? The fact that corporate insiders can buy and sell their company's shares before the public knows about the deal means that the price of the stock is lower than the price it will be once the information goes public. This means that when the news goes public, the stock price will rise significantly, leaving the insiders with the ability to sell their shares at the higher price. This is where you come in, dear reader. This tutorial will guide you through the steps of what to do in order to maximize your gains while minimizing your risk of getting caught.
